name: @rsksmart/rsk-cli
description: CLI tool for Rootstock network using Viem

scripts.wallet: pnpm run build && node dist/bin/index.js wallet
scripts.balance: pnpm run build && node dist/bin/index.js balance
scripts.transfer: pnpm run build && node dist/bin/index.js transfer --testnet --address 0xa5f45f5bddefC810C48aCC1D5CdA5e5a4c6BC59E --value 0.001
scripts.tx-status: pnpm run build && node dist/bin/index.js tx --testnet --txid 0x876a0a9b167889350c41930a4204e5d9acf5704a7f201447a337094189af961c4
scripts.batch-transfer: pnpm run build && node dist/bin/index.js batch-transfer
scripts.history: pnpm run build && node dist/bin/index.js history

author: rookiecol
